# A/B Test Analyzer

## Introduction

-   AB testing website

-   control/experimental version

-   30 days

## Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Input

### Load Data

```{r}
control <- read_delim('data/control_group.csv', delim = ';')
test <- read_delim('data/test_group.csv', delim = ';')

```

### Merge Data

Merge two files together:

```{r}
combined_data <- control %>% 
  bind_rows(test)
```
